steps.title: Navigate cards
pages: Pick a **Suit** and **Rank** to jump straight to any card in your deck.
Use the selectors or keyboard shortcuts to hop around while you edit.

steps.title: Preview bar
pages: Tap the ⟨ and ⟩ buttons beside the preview to skim through neighboring cards.
Download the current card anytime with the ⬇️ button.

pages.content: Click the face image area to add art to the selected card.
Use **Bulk upload** to map many files at once; the tool sorts files by rank and suit for you.

steps.title: Ranks and fonts
pages: Choose a Google Font for ranks and indexes, then set **Size** and **Weight** to match your style.
Switch color modes to keep ::hearts:: red and ::spades:: black automatically.

steps.title: Suit icons
pages: Pick a built-in suit sheet or upload your own sprite grid.
Adjust **Icon scale**, opacity, overlays, and outlines to dial in the right look for ::suit::.

steps.title: Export
pages: Export the whole deck as a ZIP, send it to **The Game Crafter** if you have an account, or save one card at a time.
Need to resume later? Use **Save Progress** and **Import** to keep working across sessions.
